descriptions.zh: 相当于普通话的轻声助词「了」
descriptions.en: Equivalent to the unstressed auxiliary word「了」in Mandarin

descriptions.zh: 扣上，把器物广口朝下放或用来罩东西
descriptions.en: Place objects with wide mouths facing downwards or use them to cover things
Flip the bowl upside down on the table
Wear a helmet to cover your head

descriptions.zh: 扇一巴掌脸蛋，留下一个手印
descriptions.en: Slap one's face and leave a handprint
The act of turning inside out

descriptions.zh: 使软、硬物相揩擦，并使软物沾上液体或糊状物、粉状物
descriptions.en: Wipe soft and hard objects together, and make the soft object contaminated with liquid, paste, or powder
Digging ear wax with a cotton swab

descriptions.zh: 夹一点菜把碗里残剩的米饭粒擦干净
descriptions.en: Take some vegetables by chopsticks and wipe off the remaining rice grains in the bowl
Have a tickle in one's throat
Cut open the fish belly with a knife

descriptions.zh: 热狗需用刀划几下再烤
descriptions.en: Hot dogs need to be scratched a few times with a knife before being grilled
An annual salary of nearly 100 thousand yuan

descriptions.zh: 这棵树差不多有六层楼高
descriptions.en: This tree is about six stories tall
Strike hard with the palm of one's hand

descriptions.zh: 舀生米的筒形杯内底部粘附有米粒，用手掌拍打也出不来
descriptions.en: The bottom of the cylindrical cup for scooping raw rice is adhered with rice grains, which cannot fall off even by tapping with the palm of the hand

descriptions.zh: 等这件衣服慢慢把水沥干
descriptions.en: Wait for this garment to slowly drain the water

descriptions.zh: 母方男性亲属，与母亲同辈而年长于母
descriptions.en: Male relatives of the mother, who are of the same generation as the mother but are older than the mother
I have visited Beihai seven times
Do not know how to do it

descriptions.zh: 如此寒冷的天气只穿这么点儿单薄衣物，怪不得着凉发烧
descriptions.en: Wearing only such thin clothes in such cold weather, no wonder you caught a cold and had a fever
Squatting in the toilet to defecate
Squatting so long time that my legs are numb

descriptions.zh: (往往由于际遇不好而)停留某处
descriptions.en: Staying in a certain place (often due to bad luck)
He's even more powerful than you
The measure unit of thin layers
Remove the oil layer (with a spoon)
Body parts or objects falling, then are injured or damaged
Stung, bitten by mosquitoes, spiders, centipedes, leeches, etc.
Assault, make a surprise attack on

descriptions.zh: 下雨天打功夫，出来一个消灭一个（出来一个淋湿一个）
descriptions.en: Practice martial arts on rainy days, eliminate enemies one by one (get wet when one comes out)

descriptions.zh: 这筒烟花射了两发而已
descriptions.en: This firework only fired two shots

sentences.format: 简简单单又一餐，屌__self__{A+37-kat7}又一日

descriptions.zh: 简简单单又得一餐，骂骂咧咧又过一天
descriptions.en: Simply finish another meal, curse and spend another day
Refers to the morning or evening of the same day
The liquid is about to overflow
This bucket of water is overflowing

descriptions.zh: 江水水位上涨，淹没岸边
descriptions.en: The rising water level of the river submerged the shore
The original meaning was to visit prostitutes

descriptions.zh: 拿一块石头把这沓纸压住，以免被风吹走
descriptions.en: Hold down this stack of paper with a stone to prevent it from being blown away by the wind

descriptions.zh: 语意不详，可能是「抖动」、「摆动」的意思
descriptions.en: The meaning is unclear, it may mean「shaking」、「swing」
Knee joint; The「膝」 here is pronounced as「slot8」
To tell lies and play tricks on people

descriptions.zh: （在路边）挥手示意让班车停下
descriptions.en: Wave to stop the shuttle bus (on the roadside)

descriptions.zh: 打开窗使空气流通以除闷热
descriptions.en: Open the window to allow air circulation to eliminate stuffiness and heat

descriptions.zh: 那样的话，为什么你不快点出发？
descriptions.en: In that case, why don't you leave immediately?
The omitted form of derogatory words, same as「{U+4E2A-geo3}{A+tsu}{U+4E2A-geo3}」
Stubborn in one's own opinions and not listening to advice
Persuade but not change, very stubborn!

descriptions.zh: 几天不洗头，导致头发打结成一坨坨
descriptions.en: Not washing hair for a few days resulted in hair getting tangled and clumped up
Vegetable juice mixed with rice for consumption
The measure unit of a cloth shaped water curtain

descriptions.zh: 每一片地的青菜需要泼洒十次尿液
descriptions.en: Each patch of vegetable field needs to be sprinkled with urine ten times
Press the mobile phone screen with fingers

descriptions.zh: 用指头把洗洁精按出来
descriptions.en: Press out the detergent with fingers
Please add me to the group

descriptions.zh: 你这道题目写错了，已经被老师划了斜线
descriptions.en: You made a mistake in answering this question, and it has already been crossed by the teacher

descriptions.zh: 摁，按压 (用指头、杆状物体)
descriptions.en: Press with a rod like object

descriptions.zh: 用勺子把熟蛋黄压成粉末
descriptions.en: Press cooked egg yolks into powder with a spoon
Do not aim the gun at anyone
Aim at the trash can and then throw it in

descriptions.zh: 量词，衡量成颗成块的物体（泛粤典好像用「颗」）
descriptions.en: The measure unit of pieces or blocks of objects

descriptions.zh: 身子酸胀不舒服，往往因为劳累
descriptions.en: The body is sore and uncomfortable, often due to fatigue

descriptions.zh: 搅拌固体或液体使之分布均匀
descriptions.en: Stir solid or liquid to distribute evenly

descriptions.zh: 一边冲奶粉，一边搅拌均匀
descriptions.en: Mix the milk powder evenly while brewing

descriptions.zh: 含糊不清的话语随便应付

descriptions.en: Stir by inserting rod like objects and swirling)
Rotate the crank of the grain blower

descriptions.zh: 手机看久了会损害视力
descriptions.en: Long term use of mobile phones can damage vision

descriptions.zh: 你太拖拉了吧！做了一个小时的作业还没完成
descriptions.en: How procrastinating you are! You have been doing homework for an hour but haven't finished it yet

descriptions.zh: 将（摩托车、自行车等的）脚撑踢起来
descriptions.en: Kick up the side leg support (of a motorcycle, bicycle, etc.)
These sweet potatoes have a very soft taste
The combination of「我{U+5C4B-uk7}」, the meaning is「my home」
He stayed overnight at my house
The combination of「你{U+5C4B-uk7}」, the meaning is「your home」
The combination of「{U+4F62-gyu5}{U+5C4B-uk7}」, the meaning is「his home」、「her home」
It was sent by his family
The combination of「{U+4EBA-njan4}{U+5C4B-uk7}」, the meaning is「others」; It is sometimes unstressed
A small segment of a long object

descriptions.zh: 把（两广地区的长）粽子折断成两小段
descriptions.en: Bend and break Zongzi (a long rice dumpling in Guangdong and Guangxi) into two pieces

descriptions.zh: 衡量片状物体（例如「瓦片」）断开后的部分
descriptions.en: The measure unit of the separated parts of a sheet-like object (Such like tiles)
A disc breaks into two pieces
Gently sprinkle water with one's hand
Take a basin of water and sprinkle it on the ground
Blow one's nose to repel the nasal mucus

descriptions.zh: 位于垫面的凸起使人不舒服或损伤，硌
descriptions.en: The protrusion on the cushion surface makes human body uncomfortable or damaged

descriptions.zh: 鞋垫下面有凸起使脚掌不舒服
descriptions.en: There is a protrusion under the insole that makes the foot uncomfortable

descriptions.zh: 竹席下面好像有泥沙似的，硌得我背部难受
descriptions.en: There seems to be sands under the bamboo mat, which makes my back uncomfortable
Smoke a bamboo water pipe; Smoke hookah

descriptions.zh: 小称符号，表示前字念小称音
descriptions.en: Cute-tone symbol, indicating the preceding character being pronounced as cute-tone

descriptions.zh: 弱读符号，表示前字弱读
descriptions.en: Unstressed symbol, indicating the preceding character being pronounced weakly, unstressed
I think we had better go home

descriptions.zh: 完成体标记，前字声调有变化
descriptions.en: Perfect tense symbol, there is a change at the tone of preceding character

descriptions.zh: 更加，此处的「更」字声调有变化
descriptions.en: Even more. There is a change at the tone of「更」
